CustomField.formula: IF( MonthlySales__c >= 5000000 , 6, IF(MonthlySales__c >= 3000000, 5, IF(MonthlySales__c >= 2000000, 4, IF(MonthlySales__c >= 1000000, 3, IF(MonthlySales__c >= 500000, 2, 1)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: [ 6 Point = Monthly Sales >= 5,000,000 ] [ 5 Point = Monthly Sales >= 3,000,000 ] [ 4 Point = Monthly Sales >= 2,000,000 ] [ 3 Point = Monthly Sales >= 1,000,000 ] [ 2 Point = Monthly Sales >= 500,000 ] [ 1 Point = Monthly Sales < 500,000 ]
CustomField.label: Monthly Sales Score
